name: Jailbreaker (itch)
description:
The game is still currently in the works. This is a game I'm making in my free-time. Gameplay footage is still work in progress but more progress is being made steadily. My aim is to finish the game before the end of May. I hope it is worth the wait!

A game about breaking out of jail.

Jailbreaker is a short game about an unorthodox, sci-fi world of pixels and parkour. Find your way out of your confinement and venture through eerie worlds while evading dangerous traps that halt your ascent. Reach the paramount. Reach.

One Button Controls: a very simple control scheme with robust mechanisms behind the scenes to provide forgiveness and experimentation.

Hand-Crafted Levels: unique floors with a slew of mechanics to keep you interested.

Fine Tuned Difficulty: each floor is fairly challenging but bite-sized, and the replay is almost instant.

Short but Sweet: can be finished while eating breakfast, though that depends on your portion, I think.

Join me on Discord or check out my Twitter to show your support!
